nodes.text: Swamp slugs were a species of creature native to the swamps of the planet Dagobah. Their oesophagus were filled with thousands of teeth capable of grinding up plants and animals, but not suitable for swallowing droids. In 3 ABY, during his Jedi training under Yoda, Luke Skywalker came across a swamp slug.
Swamp slugs excreted a slime that was highly prized by chefs and bartenders as a syrup. An imitation recipe called Dagobah Slug Syrup was created by chef Strono Tuggs and included in his cookbook.

The Dagobah Slug Slinger was an alcoholic drink served at Oga's Cantina which was named after these creatures and made drinkers feel as though they were slung around by the slugs after drinking it. Oga Garra also kept a small one as a pet, which swam in one of the tanks located along the bar back. The drink was made with genuine slug slime or with imitation Dagobah Slug Syrup.
